courses.title: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
courses.description: Master web development from front to back with hands-on projects in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

courses.title: Frontend Developer Essentials
courses.description: Learn to build responsive and accessible user interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React and Tailwind.

courses.title: JavaScript Mastery: Zero to Hero
courses.description: Deep dive into JavaScript fundamentals and advanced concepts including ES6, DOM manipulation, and asynchronous programming.

courses.title: React.js Complete Guide
courses.description: Build powerful web apps with React.js, covering components, hooks, context API, routing, and best practices.

courses.title: Backend Development with Node & Express
courses.description: Learn to build scalable server-side applications using Node.js, Express, and RESTful APIs.

courses.title: Mastering Git & GitHub
courses.description: Version control like a pro with this complete Git and GitHub course. Includes branching, merging, and real-world workflows.

courses.title: Responsive Web Design with Tailwind CSS
courses.description: Create beautiful and responsive websites using the utility-first Tailwind CSS framework.

courses.title: Building REST APIs with Express & MongoDB
courses.description: Build real-world APIs using Express.js and MongoDB, including CRUD operations and authentication.

courses.title: Web Development Project Lab
courses.description: Work on real-life projects and build a strong portfolio with guided mentorship and live feedback.

courses.title: UI/UX Design for Web Developers
courses.description: Learn the essentials of UI/UX design to enhance your web development projects and build user-friendly interfaces.
